001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Strings;
004import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.regex.Pattern;
007
008/**
009 * Utility for turning {@code key=value} CLI arguments into a lookup map.
010 * <p>Stateless and thread-safe.</p>
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public final class CliArgsParser {
015  private static final Pattern KEY_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("^[A-Za-z0-9._-]+$");
016
017  private CliArgsParser() {}
018
019  /**
020   * Converts command-line arguments into a mutable map split on the first {@code '='}.
021   *
022   * @param args raw CLI arguments; {@code null} returns an empty map
023   * @return mutable map keyed by the argument prefix prior to {@code '='}
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  public static Map<String, String> toMap(String[] args) {
027    Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
028    if (args == null) {
029      return map;
030    }
031    for (String raw : args) {
032      if (raw == null) {
033        continue;
034      }
035      String arg = raw.trim();
036      if (arg.isEmpty()) {
037        continue;
038      }
039      int idx = arg.indexOf('=');
040      if (idx <= 0 || idx == arg.length() - 1) {
041        throw new IllegalArgumentException("argument must be key=value (was '" + raw + "')");
042      }
043      String key = arg.substring(0, idx).trim();
044      String value = arg.substring(idx + 1).trim();
045      validateKey(key);
046      validateValue(key, value);
047      map.put(key, value);
048    }
049    return map;
050  }
051
052  private static void validateKey(String key) {
053    if (!KEY_PATTERN.matcher(key).matches()) {
054      throw new IllegalArgumentException("invalid argument name: " + key);
055    }
056    if (containsControl(key)) {
057      throw new IllegalArgumentException("argument name must not contain control characters: " + key);
058    }
059  }
060
061  private static void validateValue(String key, String value) {
062    if (value.indexOf('\0') >= 0) {
063      throw new IllegalArgumentException("argument " + key + " must not contain null bytes");
064    }
065    if (containsControl(value)) {
066      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
067          "argument " + key + " must not contain control characters");
068    }
069    // Blank values are allowed for options toggled explicitly; downstream validators will reject as needed.
070    if (!value.isEmpty()) {
071      Strings.requireNonBlank(key, value);
072    }
073  }
074
075  private static boolean containsControl(CharSequence value) {
076    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
077      if (Character.isISOControl(value.charAt(i))) {
078        return true;
079      }
080    }
081    return false;
082  }
083}
